dc_description_s: The PA_Hospices_2016 layer contains the latitude and longitude coordinates of 187 hospice centers in Pennsylvania. When possible, efforts were made to confirm the rooftop location of each hospice center. The accuracy of geocoding is available in Geocoding Certainty attribute field (Geocoding Certainty: Rooftop="00", Street="01", Zip Centroid="04", Not geocoded="99"). Latitude and longitude fields are recorded in the WGS 1984 coordinate system. Last updated: 11/09/2016 Contact Us: Pennsylvania Department of Health Division of Health Informatics RA-DHICONTACTUS@pa.gov 717-782-2448
